title: STAT+: Pharmalittle: We’re reading about cancer drug trials, Europe’s biotech push, and much more
description: Drug trials offer people with cancer hope and free medicine, but they also create incentives for doctors in private clinics to sign up patients for unproven treatments
content: Drug trials offer people with cancer hope and free medicine, but they also create incentives for doctors in private clinics to sign up patients for unproven treatments
